name: Sports Cars Racing
description:
This 3D champion racing, rally game is all free
Just download and playing this 3D nice fantastic nice city game. Now you can become a true champion of racing. This amazing racing game lets you drive fast cars and winning championships at high speeds.
You like sports, and your passion is high speeds on high racing road with super sports car, just play this game. This is very basic of champion car sports racing, rally game
Racing, rally your sports super car with high speed on racing road and nice fantastic nice city environment, doing some more thrilling and relaxing with some drifting your super sports car on racing high way and take champion winner is much funny and exciting. Just take your dream sports super car and start your racing.
Challenge your mind with automatic opponents players - artificial intelligent computer players

How to play
This game is very easy to play, with some simple buttons. Just press gas button and speed up your dream sports cars on speed high racing road. You're highway star
There're gas, break and change view control buttons to play, that's much easy
- Gas, break buttons to control your racing , rally car
- Swing your device or using virtual steering wheel to control your car steering
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally car
- Camera button to change your view of racing , rally car

Features:
- Amazing realistic graphics of super sports cars , nice racing rally road and fantastic nice city environment
- Simple controls buttons with gas, break ones to do your racing, rally dream super sports cars on racing road fantastic nice city environment
- Swing your device to control your super sports racing, rally cars
- Automatic controlling gear of your racing, rally sports super cars
- Camera button to change your vision of racing , rally super sports cars
- Five more automatic opponents players
- Artificial Intelligent players for your challenge
